attributes.action: Scrap the UK Music Charts, & Recognise Real Music & give knighthood to COF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap all this untalented,manufactured boring music...i.e the UK music charts today. 

And recognise real music...i.e Cradle Of Filth,Angtoria,etc..
These musicians put real effort and have talent. They deserve a knighthood.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
